title: ARTEMIS: the new European tools for estimating at different scales the pollutant emissions from road transport

author: Michel André, INRETS - The French National Institute for Transport and Safety Research

segmentation: Thank you Mr Chairman.

I am very pleased to present two or beast Artemis Research project and in particular answer resulting tools for estimating to transport pollutant emission from the transport road and non Rd transport.
The Meiko Thurs for this presentation, where her people involved in Heiser in the development of the tools or in the in the implementation in Sweden and in France recently.
Anne.
Free.

The existing tools for calculating the pollutant emission from the transport and also at harmonizing methodology becausw.
Such tools are used by the different European countries for estimating for reporting their national emission.
And, at least for this point of view, with seeing it's important that there is a certain consensus around the methodology and data that support such method.
Furthermore, the optimists project intended to develop not only micro macroscopic approach for calculating emissions that means the classical inventory at the national or regional scale, but also.
Focus on local approaches which are needed for her.
Any kind of impact studies and which are numerous now in context as.

In particular there building up of representative driving cycle for passenger car for 2 Wheelers test cycle.
To measure in a correct way, the emission four from the heavy duty engines.
A systematic analysis of the uncertainties sources from the test procedure where was also conducted and that results in recommendation with respect to test procedure.
To assess quietly the real world emissions from the vehicles.

Fifteen 2 Wheelers were also tested using representative driving cycle or cold start emission where also measured.
As well as air conditioning, evaporative emission and so on.

An important effort was also dedicated to the traffic characteristics as far as this season.

Trust, distribution and the correspondence analysis.

That means that this this way we are able to compute the mission for a large range of traffic situation through representatives speed curves.
